column5: Hi Everyone,  Where's the best place to buy a decent manual ice auger?  Thanks in advance.
CT and WM both sell normark hand augers in the swede bore nad fin bore models! likely your cheepest place to buy quality, 55-65$ on average for a 6-8inch
I bought my last 2 from CT. Or where you cen get the best $$ value
He's looking for people who have purchased one within the last decaded !!
HAHAHAH     funny u say that my ole' man bought one in 87' and still uses the same one, a 6 inch normark swede bore with a lot of welds on it!
I have  but used, it twice! The original was older than you and probaly had  more miles on it than your car . . .
CTC in Newmaket had some Fin Bore III's.

If your going to buy a manual,go with the finbor 3 . STAY away from the old style.  A tip for ya. LET THE AUGAR DO THE CUTTING FOR YA. Just turn it. It will go down by it,s self. DO NOT try to push it through the ice.
